name: Puzzle Uno
description:
This is an early single player version game, from a multiplayer project. The objective is to reach the top of the summit before your Power Pack is depleted!

Getting there, you will need to observe the sound, position and direction of the moving platforms when the right button is pressed!

It's critical to set them up correctly at the right moment for crossing over to your winning destination or you might get caught scrambling for another way out!

Good Luck and Have fun!
